elements.name: postSummaryCorrectionHeaderReasonCode
elements.originalName: Post Summary Correction Header Reason Code (35-Record)
elements.description: A code that identifies the reason that the submitted header data is being changed for a PSC.

options.H01: Entry Type Non-AD/CVD-to-AD/CVD. The Entry Type Code has been changed from a type that does not have AD/CVD (e.g., 01) to a type that does have AD/CVD (e.g., 03).
options.H02: Entry Type-Other. The Entry Type Code has been changed (other than the types indicated by PSC Header Reason Code H01 or H14).
options.H04: Mode of Transportation. The Mode of Transportation (MOT) Code has changed.
options.H05: Bond-Surety. The basic and/or additional Surety Company Code has changed.
options.H06: Bond–Superseding. The Continuous Superseded Bond Indicator has changed.
options.H07: Bond-Other. Other basic and/or additional bond data has changed. Includes Bond Type Code, Single Transaction Bond Amount, Single Transaction Bond Producer Account Number, Bond Waiver Indicator, Bond Waiver Reason Code.
options.H08: Electronic Invoice Availability. The Electronic Invoice Indicator has changed.
options.H09: Shipment Usage Type. The Shipment Usage Type Code has changed.
options.H10: Consignee. The Consignee Number has changed.
options.H11: Date of Importation. The Date of Importation has changed.
options.H12: State of Destination. The U.S. State of Destination Code has changed.
options.H13: Header Fee. One or more Entry Summary Header Fee (Header Fee Amount or Accounting Class Code) has changed. Includes 311 (Informal MPF), 500 (Manual Surcharge), and 496 (Mail).
options.H14: Entry Type AD/CVD-to-Non-AD/CVD. The Entry Type Code has been changed from a type that does have AD/CVD (e.g., 03) to a type that does not have AD/CVD (e.g., 01).
options.H99: Data Change–Other. Another Entry Summary Header Grouping data element, not listed above, has changed. Clearly describe the reason for the change in the PSC Filing Explanation grouping (36-Record).
